LOCAL.TYPES: ` *"* use this source file for any type declarations (class *"* definitions, interfaces or data types) you need for method *"* implementation or private method's signature
LOCAL.IMPLEMENTATIONS: ` *"* local class implementation for public class *"* use this source file for the implementation part of *"* local helper classes
LOCAL.MACROS: ` *"* use this source file for any macro definitions you need *"* in the implementation part of the class

ITEM.SOURCE:
` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
CALL FUNCTION 'ENQUEUE_EYGPL_RUN' EXPORTING mode_ygpl_run_info = 'X' run_id = run_id categ = cat * X_RUN_ID = ' ' * X_CATEG = ' ' _scope = '2' _wait = 'X' _collect = ' ' EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 system_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc = 1. RAISE foreign_lock. ELSEIF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE sys_failure. ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** IF cat IN ygpl_mt_categori=>x_categ. RAISE system_cat. ENDIF. IF ygpl_mt_categori=>do_exists( cat ) IS INITIAL. RAISE cat_not_found. ENDIF.
CALL METHOD lock EXPORTING run_id = process_id cat = cat EXCEPTIONS foreign_lock = 1 sys_failure = 2 OTHERS = 3. IF sy-subrc = 1. RAISE foreign_lock. ELSEIF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE sys_failure. ENDIF.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * **********************************************************************
CALL FUNCTION 'DEQUEUE_EYGPL_RUN' EXPORTING MODE_YGPL_RUN_INFO = 'X' RUN_ID = run_id CATEG = cat * X_RUN_ID = ' ' * X_CATEG = ' ' _SCOPE = '3' _SYNCHRON = ' ' _COLLECT = ' '.

` ********************************************************************** * Author : Al'oustad Taryck BENSIALI (taryck.bensiali@gmail.com) * * Date : 2008 December * ********************************************************************** IF cat IN ygpl_mt_categori=>x_categ. RAISE system_cat. ENDIF. IF ygpl_mt_categori=>do_exists( cat ) IS INITIAL. RAISE cat_not_found. ENDIF.
CALL METHOD unlock EXPORTING run_id = process_id cat = cat.
